title: Service Quality Competency Enhancement: Language Education Design Using Visual Instructional Design Representation Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental language education experience and mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Can clearly articulate learning activity structures using visual design representation tools
Can develop learner experience and activity-centered language education design documents
The learner collaborates with three peer instructors to share service design ideas twice monthly and submits an improved plan reflecting at least four out of five feedback checklist items.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
